creator: mcnelson@mindspring.com
text:
New installation of Apache.

The documentation cannot be read by clicking on the index.html, using internet 
explorer.

This is true for each and every one of the documentation directories.

Perfectly useless.

Note carefully - the apache and documentation included with my old cygwin 
worked well.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
The documentation is intended to be read over HTTP, i.e. you need a webserver
for it. You might want to download a CHM package or zipped offline package from
<http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/httpd/docs/>.

Thanks for using Apache.
